languages.text: "Только хочу спросить — вы уверены, что готовы все решить сейчас? Не хотите пообщаться со всеми сторонами, составить мнение о претендентах? Узнать, кто такой Фиделио, в конце концов?"
"Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"
languages.original_text: "Только хочу спросить — вы уверены, что готовы все решить сейчас? Не хотите пообщаться со всеми сторонами, составить мнение о претендентах? Узнать, кто такой Фиделио, в конце концов?"

traits.locale_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"
"Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"
"Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"
"Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"
"Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"

languages.text: “我只想问你一个问题：你确定你已经准备好彻底解决这个问题了吗？或许你可以和所有人都谈谈，确定你关于继承人的看法？如果可以的话，或许你可以弄清楚这个菲迪奥到底是谁？”
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"

traits.locale_text: “我只想问你一个问题：你确定你已经准备好彻底解决这个问题了吗？或许你可以和所有人都谈谈，确定你关于继承人的看法？如果可以的话，或许你可以弄清楚这个菲迪奥到底是谁？”

languages.text: «Deje que le pregunte: ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de que ya sabe todo lo que necesita para resolver esto? ¿No quiere hablar con todos los involucrados y formar una opinión propia sobre los pretendientes? ¿Descubrir quién es Fidelio, al menos?».
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"

traits.locale_text: «Deje que le pregunte: ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de que ya sabe todo lo que necesita para resolver esto? ¿No quiere hablar con todos los involucrados y formar una opinión propia sobre los pretendientes? ¿Descubrir quién es Fidelio, al menos?».

languages.text: 「ひとつだけお聞きします。今すぐにこの件に決着をつける覚悟はおありですか？あらゆる視点から話を聞いて、相続人の候補者についてあなたなりの結論を出してみてはいかがでしょうか？せめてフィデリオという人物の正体を突き止めてみては？」
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつだけお聞きします。今すぐにこの件に決着をつける覚悟はおありですか？あらゆる視点から話を聞いて、相続人の候補者についてあなたなりの結論を出してみてはいかがでしょうか？せめてフィデリオという人物の正体を突き止めてみては？」

languages.text: "Nur eine Frage – seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr jetzt alles abwickeln wollt? Vielleicht möchtet Ihr noch mit allen Beteiligten sprechen, Euch selbst eine Meinung über die Anwärter bilden? Oder zumindest herausfinden, wer Fidelio ist?"
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"

traits.locale_text: "Nur eine Frage – seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr jetzt alles abwickeln wollt? Vielleicht möchtet Ihr noch mit allen Beteiligten sprechen, Euch selbst eine Meinung über die Anwärter bilden? Oder zumindest herausfinden, wer Fidelio ist?"

languages.text: « Mais avant d'aller plus loin, êtes-vous vraiment {mf|certain|certaine} d'être {mf|prêt|prête} à clore cette affaire ? Ne voulez-vous pas parler à toutes les parties impliquées dans cette affaire et former votre propre opinion à leur sujet ? Ou, au moins, découvrir l'identité de ce fameux Fidélio ? »
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais avant d'aller plus loin, êtes-vous vraiment {mf|certain|certaine} d'être {mf|prêt|prête} à clore cette affaire ? Ne voulez-vous pas parler à toutes les parties impliquées dans cette affaire et former votre propre opinion à leur sujet ? Ou, au moins, découvrir l'identité de ce fameux Fidélio ? »

languages.text: "Meseleyi hemen çözüme kavuşturmak istediğinizden emin misiniz peki? Belki diğer taraflarla da konuşup, hak iddia edenlere dair fikir edinmek isteyebilirsiniz. En azından Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu öğrenirsiniz belki."
languages.original_text: "Let me just ask you — are you sure you're ready to resolve everything now? Maybe you'd like to talk to all sides, form your own opinion of the claimants? Find out who Fidelio is, if nothing else?"

traits.locale_text: "Her şeyi hemen çözmek istediğinize emin misiniz? Belki diğer taraflarla da konuşup hak sahipleri hakkında bir fikir edinmek isteyebilirsiniz. En azından Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu öğrenirsiniz belki?"
